title: Prime Villas - Maharagama
details:
The most luxurious and appreciated property which you can obtain from the heart of the Maharagama, city which is well developed with facilities including supermarkets, fashion outlets, banks, international schools and many more.
Prime Villas Maharagama offers 7 modern architecturally designed villas harmonizing with the nature.
These villas are built on 7 to 10 perch blocks by efficiently using the space to give you the maximum output. Following features are included;
